name: Tooth Mouse
description:
A game by Natalie Cuthbert, with additional programming by Gryff David

We've captured a human, and now for the harvest! Play in our traditional blood sport, to see who can pluck the most teeth from our offering. 

Controls:  Player 1

A, D - Move Left and Right

W - Jump

Ctrl - Shoot

S - Pull Tooth 

Player 2

Left, Right Arrows - Move Left and Right 

Up Arrow - Jump 

M - Shoot 

Down Arrow - Pull Tooth

Game Pads are also supported
